span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 衍生的參數已加入到 的 集合。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 從 中指定的預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 擷取參數資訊，並填入 (Populate) 指定 物件的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫任何現有參數資訊。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要資料庫的額外呼叫以取得資訊。 requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information. 如果事先已知道參數資訊，則更有效率的明確設定資訊填入參數集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用預存程序。You can only use with stored procedures. 您無法使用填入與任意的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，例如參數化的 SELECT 陳述式。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 命令文字不是有效的預存程序名稱，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法資訊或疑難排解的考量，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的已修改的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫和修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式，當應用程式呼叫 或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames

span.span: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法資訊或疑難排解的考量，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的已修改的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫和修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式，當應用程式呼叫 或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`如`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制來產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 。. 才會成功，則符合下列條件：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string QuoteIdentifier(string unquotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function QuoteIdentifier (unquotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: unquotedIdentifier
param.span: 原始的不具引號之識別項。

span.span: The original unquoted identifier.

summary.span: 在正確目錄案例中提供不具引號的識別項時，傳回該識別項具引號的正確格式，包括適當逸出識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.

returns.span: 識別項內的內嵌引號已適當逸出。

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SchemaSeparator { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用於結構描述識別項和任何其他識別項間之分隔符號的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 當做結構描述分隔符號使用的字元。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，資料庫伺服器會藉由使用某些字元的識別項分隔的結構描述名稱，表示為識別項的結構描述。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 使用冒號，建立完整的識別項，例如人員： 客戶名稱，其中"Person"是結構描述名稱，而"CustomerName"為識別項。For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 設定這個屬性可讓開發人員修改此行為。Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetRowUpdatingHandler(class System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter adapter) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetRowUpdatingHandler (adapter As DbDataAdapter)
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string UnquoteIdentifier(string quotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function UnquoteIdentifier (quotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: quotedIdentifier
param.span: 將移除其內嵌引號的識別項。

span.span: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.

summary.span: 已提供引號識別項時，傳回該識別項不具引號的正確格式，包括不逸出識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

returns.span: 不具引號的識別項，會適當包含內嵌的引號。

span.span: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
